item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! This site is mainly used to record and accumulate some technical problems I encountered, most of which are written in a mess (please don’t mind…), it would be great if these posts can help you, even just a little. Feel free to leave comments! ;-) Language: 中文(Chinese)/日本語(Japanese)/English Email: bTAwbndpc2hlciNwcm90b25tYWlsLmNvbQ== Github RSS

item.title: Hugo建站参考
item.description: 折腾Hugo | GitHub Pages | Github Actions自动构建发布免费个人网站 - 知乎 Hugo: Deploy Static Site using GitHub Actions Features · adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod Wiki How to override CSS classes with Hugo - support - HUGO Hugo + even + GitHub Pages+ Utterances搭建个人博客 - 知乎 hugo LeaveIt主题优化二 - 简书 blogdown搭建网站以及hugo主题修改_Liripo-CSDN博客 Pasting images into Hugo markdown with vsCode on macOS

item.title: Helloworld
item.description: Hello, Hugo #include "world.h"int main(){ printf("wow"); } $$cool$$ ![](./img/foobar.jpg#center) CodePresent Day, Present Time
